body: N should have a report button for uploaders... it's fine to put "low quality" on cover page, but to put it on every panel on every page is bullshit...

Agree with setsunafseiei00 on that one, zero point in having them post here, the images are small, low quality and plastered in text multiple time per page that it is low quality...what possible point is there to them other than to fill the site with trash.
This site needs to ban the fool who's uploading this shit.
